metadata.dc:author: Lecha, M
metadata.dc:description: Several papers have dealt with evaluation of protection factors against UV-A. There is still no standardized method accepted for this evaluation. Difficulties in the technique are emphasized. The author has assayed the immediate pigment darkening reaction as evaluation for different broad band filter preparations.
metadata.dc:title: Evaluación del factor de protección (FP) frente a UV-A in vivo.
[Evaluation of the protection factor (PF) against UV-A in vivo].
